channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lime bikes left in road, 14th December
item.description:
Lime bikes left in road blocking traffic. This is a constant problem.

item.title: Leaves on pavement slippery, 14th December
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipped fridge and bed frame, 14th December
item.description:
A fridge and bed frame has been in the ally next to 95 Lenthall Road for 2 weeks. It has now been spray painted. Seems no one coming to collect so would have been fly tipped. Please help remove fridge and bed
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lenthall Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of street leaves need collecting, 14th December
item.description:
Bags of street leaves collected and bagged by the local residents (street friends) left under the tree by the roadside opposite numbers 400-404 Southborough Lane. Please kindly collect asap. Thank you!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car untaxed since 31Oct25 dumped on Wrottesley Road, 14th December
item.description:
Car outside 33 Wrottesley Road, right next to another abandoned Ford car, with no valid tax since 31Oct25 and it’s got flat tyres. It looks like it’s abandoned by the same people leaving old cars on this road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wrottesley Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
